meanings.definition: A chemical compound containing the benzoyl group.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied different benzoyls in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Benzoyls are commonly used in organic chemistry experiments.
meanings.sent3: The benzoyls in the beaker decided to have a party when the lights went out.
meanings.sent4: Her love for chemistry was like a bouquet of colorful benzoyls.
meanings.sent5: The benzoyls shimmered under the microscope, revealing their intricate structures.

meanings.sent1: We need to buy more benzoyls for the experiment.
meanings.sent2: The store had a sale on benzoyls, so I stocked up.
meanings.sent3: The benzoyls on the shelf looked like a tiny army ready for action.
meanings.sent4: The field was covered in benzoyls, creating a beautiful carpet of colors.
meanings.sent5: Each of the benzoyls had a unique shape, like pieces of a puzzle waiting to be solved.
